function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"People not following Covid-19 protocols such as maintaining six feet distance and other health protocols","Impact":"Increased risk of the spread of Covid-19 and other communicable diseases","Mitigation":"Promoting and enforcing adherence to Covid-19 protocols, education on the importance of following protocols","Technologies":"Public health messaging, monitoring systems for adherence to protocols","People":"General public, users of built environments","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, building management"},{"Description":"Psychological difficulty in making people follow the protocols","Impact":"Increased risk of non-compliance with Covid-19 protocols","Mitigation":"Addressing psychological barriers, providing support and resources for mental well-being","Technologies":"Psychological support platforms, mental health apps, education and awareness campaigns","People":"General public, individuals","Owner":"Mental health organizations, government, community support services"},{"Description":"Congestion and lack of social distancing in urban spaces and social gathering areas","Impact":"Higher risk of Covid-19 transmission and spread in built environments","Mitigation":"Redesigning urban spaces to facilitate social distancing, creating pocket spaces for smaller gatherings, promoting outdoor activities","Technologies":"Urban planning software, spatial analysis tools, crowd monitoring systems","People":"Urban planners, architects, community organizations","Owner":"Urban planning authorities, city governments, community organizations"}]}
